text: Anil Madhav Dave (6 July 1956 â€“ 18 May 2017) was a Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) politician and the Minister of State for Environment, Forest and Climate Change (Independent Charge) in the Narendra Modi ministry from July 2016 until his death. He was born in Badnagar, Madhya Pradesh. Dave died on 18 May 2017 from cardiac arrest caused by pneumonia at a hospital in New Delhi at the age of 60 ==References== ==Other websites== * Anil Dave, Rajya Sabha Profile Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Madhya Pradesh Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Anil Madhav Dave
